Text: Thank you for uploading! Love all the characters in this mad show  :-D
Thanks a lot! I love this show.

i heard they canceled the season...next episodes won't be out for a year, so these 8 eps are all we got.  i am very pissed & glad i d/l these episodes off tpb & not buy the dvds so i dont put money in all these greedy fucks pockets. Fuck the writers & the producers.  By the time they air the rest of the epidodes i wont care about this show anymore
